215
SERVICE OF A DECREE OF DISTRIBUTION
(1) A decree of distribution shall be served on all the heirs and legatees, as well as on persons who have enforced a claim on the basis of an inheritance.
(2) If a written statement on the renunciation of an inheritance has been submitted by an authorised person and the signature thereof has not been certified, the decree of distribution shall be served on both the heir and the authorised person.
(3) The final decree of distribution shall be sent to the competent tax office.
